experience: You and Paul both know Dr. DARRELL RICHARDSON, Mission Critical Ops, Trish Bear, and 55 others
Chief Technology Officer / Chief Information Officer
Beyondnet Solutions is a premier Managed Service Provider (MSP) serving the U.S. market.  Specializing in all-inclusive service offerings.

Oversees 5 national offices with $5M budget. Responsible for strategic planning, infrastructure development, IT security, quality assurance, vendor relations, contract management, forecasting, and budgeting. Manages 30+.✪ Improved data collection infrastructure and optimized analytics; cut data delivery time by over 40%.✪ Modernized infrastructure through virtualization; reduced annual costs by 30%, downtime by 90%. ✪ Targeted and obtained ATO from the federal government; enabled $200M revenue stream over 5 years. ✪ Designed and implemented business continuity plan; decreased RTO by 90%; avoided $2M expense.✪ Developed employee retention plan; reduced annual turnover by 90%, incremental HR costs by $150K. ✪ Spearheaded and instituted employee training program; facilitated 3 managerial promotions in 9 months.✪ Optimized WAN infrastructure; boosted WAN performance by 80%, achieved $25K monthly cost savings. ✪ Engineered an enhanced security architecture; achieved 100% compliance with 0 assessment findings.✪ Implemented video conferencing in lieu of travel; cut annual procurement travel expenses by $60K.

Oversaw $500K annual IT operations budget. Responsible for strategic planning, system architecture development, budgeting, procurement, vendor relations, contract negotiation, and IT security. Managed 3 direct reports.✪ Engineered secure mobile technology to support sales team; increased sales by 30% over 12 months. ✪ Researched and implemented data encryption solution; secured $1M in proprietary company data.  ✪ Negotiated 30+ vendor agreements for equipment and systems; secured 15% savings on capital costs.✪ Planned and executed business growth initiative; received New Dealer of the Year Award for 2007.

Launched and grew start-up business. Responsible for strategic planning, organizational development, operations management, sales, marketing, account management, customer service, and talent development. Led 20 FTEs.✪ Launched managed services portfolio with 6 product lines; averaged 100% annual growth over 5 years. ✪ Authored and instituted sales and marketing plan; grew annual revenue from $0 to $2M in 60 months.✪ Recruited and mentored 20 new employees over a 3-year period; achieved 100% annual retention.✪ Designed and managed data center implementation; increased capacity by 300% over 4 months.✪ Evaluated and optimized infrastructure utilization; netted 30% cost savings over a 4-year period.

recommendations: I have worked with Paul for the past 6 years in his role as CIO for Progressive Financial.  Paul is a proven Information Technology professional who built and managed an IT shop that met or exceeded all requirements to include the selection of multiple IT and security tools to support IT operations.  Paul continued to grow as an IT professional in pursuing and earning his CISSP to further enhance his information assurance and  security skills.  His abilities directly related to Progressive earning and maintaining an unconditional Authority to Operate on a key IT system to support the Department of Education.  Paul has proven his ability to quickly grasp and implement appropriate solutions across the IT spectrum.  Paul will continue to be an asset to any organization's IT and/or security group.

summary: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY EXECUTIVEExecutive IT professional with a passion for innovation through technology.  IT does not exist for its own sake; but, as a tool that should be used to support and drive business initiatives and processes through innovation and simplification.  This is my expertise, innovative use of technology to solve complex and often costly problems by leveraging existing investment along with the acquisition of carefully evaluated new technology.I have always had an innate curiosity and aptitude for computers.  My career started as a computer technician.  From installing network wiring to diagnosing desktop system issues, I quickly learned the fundamentals of troubleshooting from layer 1 on up.  As my career advanced, I studied networking and participated in increasingly advanced implementations. Most recently, I have focused on cybersecurity and information assurance.Having risen through the ranks, I understand the IT process at all levels.  This experience and knowledge allow me to relate to a diverse group of colleagues. It inspires confidence and respect and contributes to my ability to be a highly effective leader.I’ve held various management roles and have reached the executive level.  Being a natural leader who works tirelessly to improve my management and leadership skills, these roles are where I excel. My ability to consistently recruit, mentor and retain top talent - coupled with solving business problems through innovation - has consistently resulted in a substantial and measurable value. Specialties:  Strategic IT Planning & Leadership, Network and Security Architecture, Innovation & Simplification, Cyber Security & Information Assurance, Governance, GRC, Project Management, Vendor/Contractor ManagementCertifications:  CISSP, CICP, TCNA, NTP, MCSE, CCNA Security, Network+
name: Paul Leavens
title: Chief Technology Officer / Chief Information Officer at Beyondnet Solutions
